    public class DummyIme
extends android.inputmethodservice.InputMethodService
    Dummy IME implementation that basically does nothing

    • Method Detail

      • onEvaluateFullscreenMode

        public boolean onEvaluateFullscreenMode()
        Description copied from class: android.inputmethodservice.InputMethodService
        Override this to control when the input method should run in fullscreen mode. The default implementation runs in fullsceen only when the screen is in landscape mode. If you change what this returns, you will need to call InputMethodService.updateFullscreenMode() yourself whenever the returned value may have changed to have it re-evaluated and applied.
        Overrides:
        onEvaluateFullscreenMode in class android.inputmethodservice.InputMethodService

      • onEvaluateInputViewShown

        public boolean onEvaluateInputViewShown()
        Description copied from class: android.inputmethodservice.InputMethodService
        Override this to control when the soft input area should be shown to the user. The default implementation only shows the input view when there is no hard keyboard or the keyboard is hidden. If you change what this returns, you will need to call InputMethodService.updateInputViewShown() yourself whenever the returned value may have changed to have it re-evaluated and applied.
        Overrides:
        onEvaluateInputViewShown in class android.inputmethodservice.InputMethodService
